subject: Memorabilia and Souvenirs
Robberies and Thefts
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The former Mets clubhouse manager Charlie Samuels, 53, was charged Wednesday in connection with the theft of nearly $2.3 million in team equipment and memorabilia.
snippet: The former Mets clubhouse manager Charlie Samuels, 53, was charged Wednesday in connection with the theft of nearly $2.3 million in team equipment and memorabilia.
